fields.name: Me after the judge describes the weapon I spent hours crafting with the utmost planning and finest materials as an “improvised explosive”:
Abilities:
fields.value:
-Plant an improvised explosive at someone’s home
-Spend hours planning, along with using only the finest materials to upgrade your bomb, making it do an overkill attack, along with it bypassing all healing effects (1 use)

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
-The host must never refer to your bombs as improvised explosives. If they do it counts as a mod error
-Your bomb will immediately explode when planted, dealing a powerful/overkill rampaging attack, along with destroying the will of anyone killed in the blast
-You may plant a bomb at your own house to kill any of your visitors, but this will also kill you unless you’re healed

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Kill everyone who would oppose you, and avoid being found guilty
